title: IC3 : total damage caused by reported cyber crime 2001 to 2018
yAxis: Total damage in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Total damage in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

The line significantly increased by 71.6 from Year 2002 to 2003,increased by 115.0 from Year 2004 to 2005,increased by 295.1 from Year 2008 to 2009, and lastly, increased by 1291.3 from Year 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Total damage in million U.S. dollars, of value 2710.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Total damage in million U.S. dollars about 54.0 was reached at Year 2002
min_summary: In general Total damage in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
